description.displayText: Teresa  cared for my granddaughter from the time of her birth until age 3 1/2. During these most important years of growth,  Teresa provided a nurturing environment, opportunities for creative play, and encouragement to explore. She exhibited a keen knowledge of the stages of child development. Theresa supported my granddaughter's language development, social interactions, and emotional well-being. Teresa is a loving, kind and intelligent person.

description.displayText: We hired Teresa when our son was born.  She cared for our son until he turned 3. Both my wife and I worked long hours and we were thrilled with the care Teresa gave while we were away from home. She always had age appropriate activities planned for our son. We felt so comfortable leaving him in Teresa's care. He truly thrived during his time with her.

description.displayText: Teresa worked with our family from the time my daughter was born until we moved out of the city at the sassy age of 3 1/2. Teresa was a huge part of our family- very reliable and trustworthy for 2 working parents with demanding schedules. She was very flexible with hours and a great playful nanny.  We highly recommend her and will continue to see her as she is an important part of our daughters life.

description.displayText:
Teri worked for our family for 17 years, from when my daughter was one until she went to college. As a single mom, I could not have raised my daughter without her. She is totally dependable, punctual (always 15 minutes early) and I certainly would hire her again. We consider her part of our family. 

She is incredibly committed, creative, and cares deeply about the children she has helped raise. She is a great choice for any family!

description.displayText: Teresa worked with my family for 18 years. She is incredibly caring, creative, fun, and smart - all important qualities in a great nanny or babysitter. Teresa is particularly great with young children, and has an amazing ability to inspire young children to be imaginative and playful. However, she also understands important responsibilities like homework or sports practices, and ensures those things are completed / attended in a timely fashion. The time I spent with Teresa growing up surely left an extremely positive impression on me, as she taught me many important life lessons. I cannot speak more highly of Teresa - she is one of the best there is out there!
